Package com.adobe.xfa.font

Class FontService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.xfa.font.FontService
  • public class FontService
extends Object
    A service class to handle all font related actions.

    It provides a number of convenience methods for accessing fonts. It provides operations to get a comprehensive list of fonts, metrics, and other font related information.
